update xilewang_user

avatar_url = #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update xilewang_user set nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar_url = #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sessionkey = #{sessionkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, master_openid = #{masterOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update xilewang_user set money = money + #{modifyMoney, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rebate_money = rebate_money + #{modifyMoney, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update xilewang_user set money = money + #{modifyMoney, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, assistance_money = assistance_money + #{modifyMoney, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
